column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " Check out my Appa sand sculpture . "
#Text=Toph says : " Not bad , baldy , but I 've been working on my sandbending .
#Text=Wow , you 've even made a little Earth King and Bosco .
#Text=" Toph says : " Try and top that , Sokka .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Ta da !
#Text=" Aang says : " Is that a blubbering blob monster ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " No , it 's Suki !
#Text=" Toph says : " Suki , we 'll all understand if you break up with him over this .
#Text=" Suki says : " I think it 's sweet .
#Text=" Aang says : " But it does n't even look like - Aah !
#Text=" Aang says : " What are you doing ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Teaching you a lesson !
#Text=" Katara says : " What happened ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Zuko 's gone crazy !
#Text=I made a sand sculpture of Suki and he destroyed it !
#Text=Oh , and he 's attacking Aang .
#Text=" Aang says : " Get a grip before I blast you off this roof !
#Text=" Zuko says : " Go ahead and do it !
#Text=" Aang says : " Enough !
#Text=" Katara says : " What 's wrong with you ?
#Text=You could have hurt Aang !
#Text=" Zuko says : " What 's wrong with me ?
#Text=What 's wrong with all of you ?
#Text=How can you sit around having beach parties when Sozin 's Comet is only three days away ?
#Text=Why are you all looking at me like I 'm crazy ?
#Text=" Aang says : " About Sozin 's Comet ... I was actually gon na wait to fight the Fire Lord until after it came .
#Text=" Zuko says : " After ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm not ready .
#Text=I need more time to master firebending .
#Text=" Toph says : " And frankly , your earthbending could still use some work too .
#Text=" Zuko says : " So , you all knew Aang was going to wait ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Honestly , if Aang tries to fight the Fire Lord now , he 's going to lose .
#Text=No offense .
#Text=" Katara says : " The whole point of fighting the Fire Lord before the Comet was to stop the Fire Nation from winning the War , but they pretty much won the War when they took Ba Sing Se .
#Text=Things ca n't get any worse .
#Text=" Zuko says : " You 're wrong .
#Text=It 's about to get worse than you can even imagine .
#Text=The day before the eclipse , my father asked me to attend an important war meeting .
#Text=It was what I dreamed about for so many years .
#Text=My father had finally accepted me back .
#Text=" Ozai says : " Welcome , Prince Zuko .
#Text=We waited for you .
#Text=General Shinu , your report .
#Text=" Shinu says : " Thank you , sir .
#Text=Ba Sing Se is still under our control .
#Text=However , earthbender rebellions have prevented us from achieving total victory in the Earth Kingdom .
#Text=" Ozai says : " What is your recommendation ?
#Text=" Shinu says : " Our army is spread too thin , but once the eclipse is over and the invasion defeated , we should transfer more domestic forces into the Earth Kingdom .
#Text=" Ozai says : " Hmm .
#Text=Prince Zuko , you 've been among the Earth Kingdom commoners .
#Text=Do you think that adding more troops will stop these rebellions ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " The people of the Earth Kingdom are proud and strong .
#Text=They can endure anything , as long as they have hope .
#Text=" Ozai says : " Yes , you 're right .
#Text=We need to destroy their hope .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Well , that 's not exactly what I - " Azula says : " I think you should take their precious hope and the rest of their land and burn it all to the ground .
#Text=" Ozai says : " Yes ... Yes you 're right , Azula .
#Text=Sozin 's Comet is almost upon us , and on that day , it will endow us with the strength and power of a hundred suns .
#Text=No bender will stand a chance against us .
#Text=" Shinu says : " What are you suggesting , sir ?
#Text=" Ozai says : " When the comet last came , my grandfather , Fire Lord Sozin , used it to wipe out the Air Nomads .
#Text=Now , I will use its power to end the Earth Kingdom ... permanently .

#Text=From our airships , we will rain fire over their lands , a fire that will destroy everything ; and out of the ashes , a new world will be born , a world in which all the lands are Fire Nation and I am the supreme ruler of everything !
#Text=" Zuko says : " I wanted to speak out against this horrifying plan , but I 'm ashamed to say I did n't .
#Text=My whole life , I struggled to gain my father 's love and acceptance , but once I had it , I realized I 'd lost myself getting there .
#Text=I 'd forgotten who I was .
#Text=" Katara says : " I ca n't believe this .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I always knew the Fire Lord was a bad guy , but his plan is just pure evil .
#Text=" Aang says : " What am I gon na do ?

#Text=" Zuko says : " I know you 're scared , and I know you 're not ready to save the world , but if you do n't defeat the Fire Lord before the comet comes , there wo n't be a world to save anymore .
#Text=" Aang says : " Why did n't you tell me about your dad 's crazy plan sooner ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " I did n't think I had to .
#Text=I assumed you were still going to fight him before the comet .
#Text=No one told me you decided to wait .
#Text=" Aang says : " This is bad .
#Text=This is really , really bad .
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , you do n't have to do this alone .
#Text=" Toph says : " Yeah , if we all fight the Fire Lord together , we got a shot at taking him down .
#Text=" Sokka says : " All right !
#Text=Team Avatar is back !
#Text=Air .
#Text=Water .
#Text=Earth .
#Text=Fire .
#Text=Fan and sword !
#Text=" Aang says : " Fighting the Fire Lord is going to be the hardest thing we 've ever done together , but I would n't want to do it any other way .
#Text=" Toph says : " Yeah .
#Text=" Sokka says : " All right .
#Text=" Katara says : " Get over here , Zuko .
#Text=Being part of the group also means being part of group hugs .
#Text=" Zuko says : " There 's one technique you need to know before facing my father - how to redirect lightning .
#Text=If you let the energy in your own body flow , the lightning will follow it .
#Text=You turn your opponents ' energy against them .
#Text=" Aang says : " That 's like waterbending .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Exactly .
#Text=My uncle invented this technique himself by studying waterbenders .
#Text=" Aang says : " So , have you ever redirected lightning before ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Once , against my father .
#Text=" Aang says : " What did it feel like ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Exhilarating ... but terrifying .
#Text=You feel so powerful holding that much energy in your body , but you know if you make the wrong move , it 's over .
#Text=" Aang says : " Well , not over over .
#Text=I mean there 's always Katara and a little Spirit Water action , am I right ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Actually , I used it all up after Azula shot you .
#Text=" Aang says : " Oh .
#Text=" Zuko says : " You 'll have to take the Fire Lord 's life before he takes yours .
#Text=" Aang says : " Yeah , I 'll just do that .
#Text="
